'''Radiant Spincrystal 73''' is an item used in the [[Furnishings]] [[Euphonium Unbound: Winding]] or [[Euphonium Unbound: Soaring]] to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] [[Beyond Klesha]] in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located in [[Mawtiyima Forest]] on a crate.
